List of known commands in .proj files

- SOURCE a source file, in various programming languages
- SOURCEAM an automake file that needs to be processed and added to the list of source files
- COMPILE generate a file based on the source file

In coremake compiled files
%%BEGIN / %%END define a section to be interpreted using the coremake syntax, not the generated one
%%<command> process the coremake <command> instead of outputing the line
%(variable) replace the coremake variable with its value in the generated file
